title: Fix story draft generation timeout at line 7120
description: Story draft generation fails with 'Request timeout' error at app.js lines 6321 and 7120:29, blocking users from creating new stories
asA: user creating stories in the AIPM workspace
iWant: story draft generation to complete without timeout errors
soThat: I can successfully create new stories without interruption
acceptanceCriteria: Story draft generation completes within 30 seconds
Timeout errors are caught and handled gracefully
User sees meaningful error message instead of technical details
Retry button available when generation fails
Loading state shows progress during generation
